五つの難題・龍の首の玉

The Five Impossible Tasks - The Dragon's Neck 's Jewel
五道難題：龍頸之玉
五道難題：龍頸之玉
The Dragon's Neck Jewel
kDesc
A jewel glittering in five colours and is said to be obtained from the neck of a legendary dragon.[#Legal]
Collier brillant aux joyaux de cinq couleurs ornant le cou du dragon, créature de légende.[#Legal]
Die in 5 Farben leuchtenden Juwelen, welche den Hals des legendären Lebewesens, des Drachens, zieren.[#Legal]
I 5 brillanti gioielli colorati che adornavano il collo di un drago, una creatura leggendaria. [#Legal]
Collar de joyas brillantes de 5 colores que adornan el cuello de un dragón legendario.[#Legal]
伝説上の生物、龍の首にあるとされている、五色に光る玉。[#Legal]
전설 상의 생물, 용의 머리에 있다고 하는 다섯가지 색의 빛나는 구슬. [#Legal]
A jewel glittering in five colours and is said to be obtained from the neck of a legendary dragon.[#Legal]
據說是從傳說生物的龍頸上取下的玉石，會發出五種顏色的光芒。[#Legal]
據說是從傳說生物的龍頸上取下的玉石，會發出五種顏色的光芒。[#Legal]
A jewel glittering in five colours and is said to be obtained from the neck of a legendary dragon.[#Legal]
